Class: radioField

radioField

RadioField custom web component

Constructor

new radioField()

Properties:
Name Type Description
icon string Button icon, using font awesome. Ex. fa-calendar etc. For icon list see http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/
Source:
  • radioField.js, line 2
Examples

Basic usage:
RadioField[[1, "value 1"], [2, "value 2"]]

<j-radiofield>RadioField[[1, "value 1"], [2, "value 2"]]</j-radiofield>

RadioField with icon:
RadioField[[1, "value 1"], [2, "value 2"]]

<j-radiofield icon="fa-user">RadioField[[1, "value 1"], [2, "value 2"]]</j-radiofield>

Methods

val(value) → {mixed}

Set and get widget value
Parameters:
Name Type Description
value mixed can be empty
Source:
  • radioField.js, line 65
Returns:
Type
mixed
Examples

nopreview

var value = $('#myWidget').val() // will return widget's value to variable value

nopreview

$('#myWidget').val('myValue') // will set widget's value to 'myValue'
